[DQC.US.0068.7641] The filing has used the StatementGeographicalAxis in conjunction with the line item us-gaap:DefinedBenefitPlanFairValueOfPlanAssets with a value of 43,708,000 in the Compensation Related Costs and Retirement Benefits section of the taxonomy. These line items should not use the StatementGeographicalAxis to report a fact. To identify the physical location of the securities a member should be created that indicates both the type of security and its issuance location. i.e. EquityUSMmember
The properties of this us-gaap:DefinedBenefitPlanFairValueOfPlanAssets fact are: Period :2016-12-31 Dimensions : us-gaap:DefinedBenefitPlanByPlanAssetCategoriesAxis=us-gaap:EquitySecuritiesMember, us-gaap:FairValueByFairValueHierarchyLevelAxis=us-gaap:FairValueInputsLevel1Member, us-gaap:StatementGeographicalAxis=country:US Unit : USD
Rule Element Id:7641 Rule version: 9.0.0RC1 - http://www.sec.gov/Archives/edgar/data/26058/000002605818000020/cts-20171231.xml 5467
